name: @psenger/squirt
description: yet another peer to peer encrypted file transfer utilizing native NodeJS Streams, Crypto, and HTTP for the most effective and stealth operation

scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server && npm run build:client-compressed && npm run build:server-compressed && npm run docs:readme
scripts.build:client-compressed: cross-env COMPRESS=true rollup -c rollup-client.config.js && chmod 766 dist/squirt-client-compressed.js
scripts.build:server-compressed: cross-env COMPRESS=true rollup -c rollup-server.config.js && chmod 766 dist/squirt-server-compressed.js

author: Philip A Senger <philip.a.senger@cngrgroup.com>
